item.title: GSoC '23 The Linux Foundation @ Automotive Grade Linux (May - Nov 2023)
item.description: What is GSoC? Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is a global program that offers students an opportunity to contribute to open-source projects. The program is sponsored by Google and has been running since 2005. The program aims to bring together students and open-source organizations to work on real-world projects. The program has three phases: the community bonding period, the coding period, and the final evaluation period. ibdwuib What is The Linux Foundation and Automotive Grade Linux?

item.title: Semester-long Intern at FOSSEE, IIT Bombay (February - May 2023)
item.description: What is FOSSEE? FOSSEE is a project developed at IIT Bombay that promotes the use of FLOSS tools in academia and research. The project is funded by the National Mission on Education through ICT, Ministry of Education, Government of India. FOSSEE supports various FLOSS tools such as Scilab, Python, eSim, OpenFOAM, DWSIM, R, OpenModelica and more. My work Flatpak_Test_App (FOSSEE_Installer_Test): A proof of concept application, implemented using Qt5 and Flatpak Sandboxing.
